profileAlternative.name: Ashish Kadam
profileAlternative.headline: Software Engineer Intern at Versa Networks
profileAlternative.summary:
I am a Graduate student pursuing MS in Computer Engineering with specialization in Network Systems.I have a good knowledge of network routing protocols and various IP services.I am highly skilled in programming languages such as Python and C++.

Technical Skills:
• Programming Languages: Python, C++.
• Routing Protocols: TCP/IP, HTTP, OSPF, BGP, EIGRP, RIP, SIP, IPv4, ARP, DTP, ICMP, FTP.
• IP Services: DHCP, NAT, VLAN, DNS, LAN/WAN, SSH.
• Tools: , Wireshark, GNS3, Cisco Packet Tracer, TCPDump, Eclipse, MATLAB, Microsoft Visual Studio.
• Operating Systems: Linux, Windows, MacOS.
